Title: Provides that certified handicapped individuals may use an ATV on public land for transportation purposes only, during the hunting season
Summary: Provides that certified handicapped individuals may use an ATV on public land for transportation purposes only, during the hunting season.
LawCode: Amd ยง2403, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to use of all terrain vehicles by certified handicapped individuals on public property
